document.full_text: manny pacquiao of the philippines retained his wbo welterweight title by recording a unanimous points victory over a lackluster shane mosley at the mgm garden arena on saturday.
document.title: pacquiao easily beats mosley to retain wbo title
lines_and_colors: manny pacquiao of the philippines retained his wbo welterweight title by recording a unanimous points victory over a lackluster shane mosley at the mgm garden arena on saturday.
